forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
